goals.active: Leave the area to plan your next move.
Celebrating at the Dead End Bar
goals.complete: Some days had passed since Scarlet's demise, and while the battle was won, we all heard the echoing roar that shook the foundations of Tyria. Ominous signs aside, Kasmeer invited me to a little gathering at the Dead End Bar. The whole gang was there, even Taimi. She was up in arms about Scarlet, the drill, the ley lines; all of it. When I finally spoke with Kasmeer, she touched on the topic on all our mindsâ€”we were dealing with a new Elder Dragon. The sobering moment was interrupted by the arrival of a Seraph soldier: Belinda Delaqua, Marjory's sister. The two of them caught up a little after introductions, but Belinda didn't stay long; she was headed west to a new assignment near the Maguuma Wastes.
